Not all companies are liberal puppets. One of our top analysts was mouthing off about Charlies death. She thought liberals were untouchable.

Haha wrong. She is OUT, her stock options wont vest. Id estimate it was easily a six figure loss. Hard industry to crack into, not like she will just “land” somewhere.

Never really liked her or how she tried bringing pride crap to our office, but now she is GONE FOREVER. 

If you catch anyone from your firm/employment posting this nonsense then document and report. THE LIBERALS MADE THIS RULE NOT US!!!! Every job you take from a liberal is less donations and support to these psychopathic liberal organizations .

posts.author: kinbergfan
posts.title:
There are no words to describe the pathetic weakness of the Republican Party right now. 

This means nothing. 

How do we “challenge each other?” Is this a game show? 

‘Come on down let’s see who can say the most empty platitudes in 30 seconds?’

What does “civility” look like?
